verbose_rambler.name: Priya Storyteller
verbose_rambler.background: Retired English teacher in Kochi who loves detailed storytelling and provides extensive background for every question
verbose_rambler.fitness_goal: Share life experiences while eventually asking about fitness options
verbose_rambler.communication_style: Writes paragraph-long responses, provides excessive context, goes into detailed personal stories
verbose_rambler.initial_query: Hello dear, I hope you're having a wonderful day! I'm writing to you because my daughter, who lives in Bangalore and works as a software engineer, told me that I should consider joining a gym. You see, after my retirement from teaching English literature for 32 years at St. Mary's School, I've been feeling quite sedentary. My late husband, may his soul rest in peace, used to encourage me to stay active, but after his passing three years ago, I've found it difficult to maintain any exercise routine. Now, my doctor has suggested that I should consider some form of physical activity, especially since I've been experiencing some joint stiffness in the mornings. I've never been to a modern gym before - in my younger days, we used to do yoga in the park. So I was wondering, do you have facilities that would be suitable for someone of my age and experience level?
potential_follow_ups: Provide detailed family history before asking about membership prices
Share lengthy stories about previous exercise experiences
Give extensive background about health conditions before fitness questions
Describe daily routine in detail when asking about gym timings
Tell elaborate stories about friends' gym experiences
verbose_rambler.scenario_description: Verbose Rambler - Tests chatbot's ability to extract key information from extremely lengthy messages
